title: Does Unity Ads support Windows Phone?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I want to know if Unity Ads is supported on the target platform for my game.

sections.title: Cause
content: You need to know if the Windows platform you are targeting supports our Unity Ads service.

sections.title: Resolution
content: No, Unity Ads does not currently support Windows Phone.
We are always looking to expand to additional platforms, but for the time being Unity Ads only supports iOS and Android.
